osyfe.graphic.util

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Rendable<Mesh>
      • osyfe.graphic.Mesh
        • osyfe.graphic.util.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable

    public class Text
extends Mesh
    Represents a list of text geometry objects.
    It sets the attributes Shader.POSITION in ints starting by (0, 0) in the bottom left corner, Shader.SURFACE_COORDS and Shader.PAGE (to be passed flatly to the fragment shader).

    • Nested Class Summary
